```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
bikes <-read.csv("U:/Data Science/Bikes/202109-capitalbikeshare-tripdata.csv")
```

```{r}
# bikes_1_sep <- bikes %>%
#   filter(mday(started_at)==1) %>%
#   mutate(hr_s=hour(started_at)) %>%
#   mutate(hr_e=hour(ended_at), duration = hr_e - hr_s) 

bikes_1_sep <- bikes %>%
  filter(mday(started_at)==1) %>%
  mutate(hr_s=hour(started_at)) %>%
  mutate(hr_e=hour(ended_at), duration = hr_e - hr_s) 
```

```{r}
t=0
bikes_count <- NULL
while(t<23){
  r=1
  x =t+1
  n_bikes =0
  while(r<nrow(bikes_1_sep)){
    if(bikes_1_sep$hr_s[r]==t){
      n_bikes = n_bikes +1
    }
    else if(bikes_1_sep$hr_e[r]==t){
      n_bikes = n_bikes +1
    }
    r=r+1
  } 
  bikes_count$t[x] <- t
  bikes_count$bikes[x] <- n_bikes
  t=t+1
}
bikes_count <- data.frame(bikes_count, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```


```{r}
ggplot(bikes_count, mapping = aes(x = t, y = bikes)) +
  geom_area()+
  ggtitle("Bikes per hour")
  labs(
    x = "hour",
    y = "Number of Bikes"
  )
```
